title: Clean Water Initiative
description: Installing sustainable water filtration systems in underserved schools across Dhaka.
longDescription: In many parts of Dhaka, school children lack access to safe drinking water, leading to severe health issues and high absenteeism. Our Clean Water Initiative installs industrial-grade UV filtration systems and provides intensive maintenance training to school staff to ensure long-term sustainability. By securing a clean water source, we are creating a foundation for better health and more consistent education for thousands of children.
goals: Install 50 filters by the end of 2026
Reduce water-borne diseases in target areas by 40%

testimonial.quote: Since the filter was installed, student attendance has increased by 15% because fewer children are falling ill.
testimonial.author: Headmaster, Korail Primary

title: Youth Skills Lab
description: Providing free technical training in web development and ethical business practices.
longDescription: The Youth Skills Lab bridges the digital divide by offering intensive 6-month bootcamps for underprivileged youth. We focus on high-demand tech stacks like Next.js and Tailwind CSS, combined with critical soft skills like ethical leadership, English for business, and project management. We don't just teach coding; we build professional pathways that allow youth to compete in the global digital economy.
goals: Graduate 500 students annually with market-ready skills
Secure 70% job placement for graduates within 6 months
Launch an incubator for 10 student-led social enterprises
highlights: Direct pipeline to local tech startups

testimonial.quote: I went from having no computer experience to working as a junior developer in just six months.
testimonial.author: Sultana, Batch 4 Graduate

title: Ethical Trade Network
description: Connecting local artisans directly with global markets to ensure fair wages.
longDescription: Small-scale artisans in rural Bangladesh often lose up to 70% of their potential profit to middlemen. Our network provides a digital platform, quality control training, and logistics support that allows local craftsmen and women to sell their handmade products directly to global customers. We ensure that 100% of the fair trade price reaches the maker, enabling them to reinvest in their families and community infrastructure.
goals: Expand to 200+ artisans by next year
Increase artisan average household income by 50%
Establish a certified organic material supply chain

testimonial.quote: For the first time, my work is being valued properly. I can now afford to send my son to a better school.
testimonial.author: Anowar, Master Woodcarver

title: Urban Greenery Project
description: Transforming rooftop spaces into productive urban gardens to combat heat and hunger.
longDescription: As one of the world's most densely populated cities, Dhaka suffers from extreme 'urban heat island' effects. This project incentivizes and subsidizes the creation of rooftop gardens that provide fresh, pesticide-free produce for families. Beyond food security, these green spaces significantly lower building temperatures and improve local air quality, turning gray concrete into a living, breathing ecosystem.
goals: Conduct monthly urban farming workshops for city dwellers
Reduce local rooftop temperatures by average 3-5 degrees

testimonial.quote: My roof used to be too hot to touch. Now it provides us with fresh vegetables every single week.
testimonial.author: Mrs. Begum, Dhanmondi Resident
